name: Typographythm
description:
Open your ears and brace your fingers, because you're about to type your way to victory to the rhythm of a game made in 48 hours.

7/11/18 Patch:

  • Bug fixes.
  • Easier.
  • Less CPU intensive.

Future:

  • Full-scale development has begun, all donations will contribute to the game's release via tools assisting development, an optimal release date, scale of content,  testing, and overall refinement.

Made for the Ludum Dare 41 compo

Eligible Browsers:

  • Not Microsoft Edge
  • If the music ever cuts out then you can just restart the level by dying.
